name: Bant Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library.
• Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text: Bant is a world where death and chaos hold no sway.

name: Bedevil
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger."
—Tajic

name: Behemoth Sledge
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.
Equip {3}
flavor_text: Those who worship the great gargantuans could hardly be expected to fight with a subtle weapon.

name: Bituminous Blast
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

name: Ashen Rider
oracle_text:
Flying
When Ashen Rider enters the battlefield or dies, exile target permanent.
flavor_text: One offering to appease her on her arrival. Another to celebrate her departure.

name: Shamanic Revelation
oracle_text:
Draw a card for each creature you control.
Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.

name: Utopia Sprawl
oracle_text:
Enchant Forest
As Utopia Sprawl enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

name: Verdant Embrace
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
flavor_text: If you stop to listen, you can hear it grow.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Rancor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

name: Return of the Wildspeaker
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control.
• Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Rishkar's Expertise
oracle_text:
Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
You may cast a spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: "Control the Great Conduit? You might as well try to divert a river with your hands."

name: Kindred Summons
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

name: Paradise Druid
oracle_text:
Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped.(It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."

name: Garruk's Uprising
oracle_text:
When Garruk's Uprising enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
Creatures you control have trample. (They can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker they're attacking.)
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

name: Greater Good
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.
flavor_text:
"There's wisdom to be gained in death—whether it be one's own or someone else's."
—Jarad, Golgari Lich-Lord

name: Kenrith's Transformation
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Kenrith's Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.

name: Colossal Majesty
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them."
—Inti, Sun Empire knight

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Decree of Savagery
oracle_text:
Put four +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
Cycling {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Savagery, you may put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.

name: Explore
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

name: Abundant Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: Acidic Slime
oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
flavor_text: It fears no sword and leaves no bones behind.

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Chameleon Colossus
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Protection from black
{2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
